goal_statement: Streamline and automate the engineering program request workflow to reduce manual processing time, improve request tracking visibility, and ensure consistent data validation while maintaining quality control through structured review processes

success_criteria.criteria: Automated request generation from email reduces manual intake processing by 80%
Engineers can validate and correct imported data within streamlined interface
All stakeholders have real-time visibility into request status and assignment state
Engineers can efficiently manage their workload through accept/decline/reassign capabilities
Quality control maintained through mandatory peer review before completion
Program ready output provides complete job design ready for next phase

kpis.kpi: Request processing time from creation to assignment acknowledgment
Percentage of automatically triaged requests vs manual assignments
Data validation accuracy rate and correction frequency
Review cycle time and adjustment request frequency
Engineer utilization and workload distribution metrics
System adoption rate and user satisfaction scores

constraints.constraint: Phase 1 scope limited to engineering workflow only (sales and operations excluded)
Must be implemented as ASP.NET Blazor web application
Must integrate with existing organizational AD groups and security systems
High priority requests require 4-5 hour acknowledgment timeouts
All adjustment requests must invalidate previous approvals and restart review process
System must preserve separation between job design and pricing workflows

assumptions.assumption: Email-based request intake system will be reliable and consistently formatted
State diagram imports will be in consistent format that can be automatically parsed
Engineering team will adopt email notification workflow with embedded action buttons
Existing team management tools (potentially Bamboo HR) will provide reliable user data
Automated triage rules can be defined effectively based on client lists
SharePoint integration will be feasible for document storage and management
Current process stakeholders (Jeremy, Warren, Henry, Jason) will be available for system design validation

open_questions.question: What specific format will state diagrams be in for automated import?
How will priority levels be determined and configured for escalation timeouts?
What level of integration is required with existing Bamboo HR system?
How will automated triage rules be configured and maintained?
What are the specific requirements for SharePoint folder structure and document naming?
How will the system handle concurrent review assignments or reviewer conflicts?
What reporting and analytics capabilities are needed for management oversight?
How will the transition from current manual process to automated system be managed?
What backup and disaster recovery requirements exist for request data?
How will system performance be monitored and what are acceptable response time thresholds?
